ooo_row.column_2: Cierzoの鍛冶屋へBlue Sandを持ち込むとpieces of Blue Sand Armorを作れる
Ciezoでaromor pieceが完成するまで24時間待つ
完成したarmor pieceを受取りにCierzoの鍛冶屋へ戻る
Levantの鍛冶屋へTsar Stonesを持ち込むとpieces of Tsar Armor and Tenebrous Armorを作れる
Levantでaromor pieceが完成するまで24時間待つ
完成したarmor pieceを受取りにLevantの鍛冶屋へ戻る
Monsoonの鍛冶屋へPalladium Scrapsを持ち込むとpieces of Palladium Armorを作れる
Monsoonでaromor pieceが完成するまで24時間待つ
完成したarmor pieceを受取りにMonsoonの鍛冶屋へ戻る
Bergの鍛冶屋へCopalかPetrified Woodを持ち込むとpieces of Copal Armor and Petrified Wood Armorを作れる
Bergでaromor pieceが完成するまで24時間待つ
Return to Berg’s blacksmith to collect your armor piece.
Bring Crystal Powder, which can be crafted using an Alchemy Kit, to Helmi the Alchemist in Cierzo.
Bring a Cold Stone, which can be crafted using an Alchemy Kit, to Vay the Alchemist in Berg.
Talk to the owner of the General Store in Berg to deliver a business ledger.
Talk to the owner of the General Store in Cierzo to deliver a business ledger.
Talk to the owner of the General Store in Levant to deliver a business ledger.
Talk to the owner of the General Store in Monsoon to deliver a business ledger.
Master-Chef Arago, in Cierzo, is looking for a Cierzo Ceviche.
Ogoi the Kazite Assassin, in Berg, is looking for 2 Beast Golem scraps.
Chef Iasu, in Berg, is looking for a Manticore Tail.
Chef Tenno, in Levant, is looking for Shark Cartilage.
Get the Mushroom Shield from the depths of the Blister Burrows, north east of Cierzo.
Return the Mushroom Shield to Helen Turnbull, in Cierzo.
Find a merchant lost in the desert before he dies, and save him by giving him a Travel Ration.
Return to Tamara in Levant’s slums to announce your failure.
Return to Tamara in Levant’s slums to announce your success.
To find a treasure, follow a trail of clues. First Clue: Find a boat’s cabin, buried in the sand.
Second Clue: Delve into a hornet’s nest, inside a giant forest.
Third Clue: Find a place of claws and fangs, in a swamp’s poison.
Fourth Clue: Go inside the old docks, in the Abrassar desert, to flip a lever.
Claim the treasure inside the old docks.
Donate silver to Pigeoneye, the self-proclaimed leader of Levant’s slums.
Give a second donation to Pidgeoneye It *is* for a good cause.
Pidgeoneye ask for yet more silver. *Surely*, there is a point to all this.
As a reward for my generosity, a shop with rare goods will be opened in the slums, but Pigeoneye yet asks for more silver...
Pigeoneye requires additional silver. I’m sure this final donation will give me access to something in the slums.
Find another ghost manifesting in the Hallowed Marsh. The spectre looked like it wanted to offer something.
Find more ghosts.
Find yet more ghosts.
Find another ghost. Perhaps this spectre will have something for me.
Find and destroy the interferences just outside the Electric Lab, in the Abrassar region.
Return to the machine inside the Electric Lab.
Wrecking this golem seems to reduce the interference. Destroy any other nearby golems.
Go to the center of the Conflux Mountain, in the Chersonese, to obtain Mana. This requires a permanent sacrifice of health and stamina.
Assemble all of Myriad’s bones in the Corrupted Tombs, in the Chersonese. Start by taking the skull.
Find the torso, which is close to a lit minecart track.
Find an arm, which is close to a mana crystal.
Find an arm, which is high up and close to many-legged creatures.
Find a leg, which is close to water.
[Optional] Destroy Myriade to open the magic seal by force.
Return all the bones to Myriad’s body.
Find a small idol belonging to the Scarlet Lady, in the dungeon known as the Face of the Ancients. That dungeon is in the Enmerkar Forest.
[Optional] Offer the idol to the Red Lady’s statue.
Return the idol to the Researcher Boye.
Interact with the throne to fight Gold-Mask Lich in the Light Spire, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Choose three rewards from the Gold-Mask Lich.
Wait one week for the mechanisms of the Spire to collect more resources.
Return to the top of the Light Spire for gifts of useful minerals.
Interact with the throne to fight Jade-Mask Lich in the Dark Ziggurat, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Return to the Dark Ziggurat with Tsar Stones, Hackmanites and Palladium to get him to craft a Tsar weapon.
Take all 4 Blue Skulls in the Necropolis under Berg.
Bring the skulls back to Cremeuh, in the depths of the Necropolis.
Bring 2 Power Coils to Etios, the engineer in Cierzo, to repair the water purifying machine.
value
Find someone who can help.
Rest in one of the campsite’s bedrolls.
Speak to Rissa Aberdeen, in the village of Cierzo.
Pay 150 silver to Rissa within 5 days or you’ll lose your lighthouse in Cierzo.
Blood Price payment complete.
You have lost your lighthouse. Talk to Rissa.
[Optional] Give the Writ of Tribal Favor to Rissa instead of 150 silver.
[Optional] Give Bandages or a Life Potion to Michel Aberdeen.
Found a corpse of a sailor on the beach. If he’d been found sooner...
Talk to Rissa in the village of Cierzo.
In cities, the location of important characters can be seen on the map.
Talk to Oliele in the village of Cierzo.
Go to a city in the Enmerkar Forest, the Hallowed Marsh or the Abrassar desert to join a faction. Innkeepers can give you directions.
Do a small task for Sagard, Julius, or Gabriella in Berg.
Do a small task for Cyrene or Baron Montgomery in Levant.
Do a small task for Zephyrien, Lockwell, or Mofat in Monsoon.
Joined the Blue Chamber Collective.
Joined the Holy Mission of Elatt.
Joined the Heroic Kingdom of Levant.
Talk to Yzan in the village of Cierzo.
Talk to Rissa in the village of Cierzo.
To join the Blue Chamber, talk to Rissa, inside Berg’s east quarter.
To join the Heroic Kingdom, talk to Yzan, in Levant’s north-west quarter.
To join the Holy Mission, talk to Oliele, near Monsoon’s entrance.
Talk to Cardinal Bourlamaque in Monsoon’s temple.
Talk to Rissa in Berg, then commit to the faction.
Talk to Queen Calixa, in Levant’s palace, and commit to the faction.
Talk to Cardinal Bourlamaque in Monsoon’s temple.
Go to Elatt’s altar at the back of Monsoon’s temple, then commit to the faction.
Stop the 3 warlords in the Fortress of Vendavel, located in the south-west of the Chersonese.
Deal with Crock, the drunkard Warlord.
Deal with Balira, the Witch Warlord.
Deal with Rospa, the Kazite Warlord.
Kill Rospa in Vendavel or convince Eto, the trainer in Cierzo, to sacrifice himself.
Talk to Burac in Cierzo for a reward.
Vendavel’s warlords have attacked Cierzo by now…
Cierzo has been devastated.
Kill the Wendigo inside the Corrupted Tomb, on the other side of the Ghost Pass, to the north-east of the Chersonese.
Talk to Balira in Vendavel.
Find white-clad missionaries on the Pilgrim Road, flanked with luminous Sun-Pillars, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Return to Cardinal Bourlamaque, in Monsoon's temple.
Talk to Mofat in the city of Monsoon.
Talk to Mofat in the city of Monsoon.
Talk to Mofat in the city of Monsoon.
Talk to the Philosopher Trainer Alemmon, in the north-east of Monsoon.
Find the bandit hideout on spiraling cliffs, in the Hallowed Marsh's west.
Investigate the hideout for several pieces of evidence.
Go to the city of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest, to warn someone in a position of authority.
[Optional] Confront Jager Sullivan in the City of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest.
[Optional] Present the evidence to Lockwell, in Monsoon.
Find the priest who fled into the desert, in Abrassar’s south-west.
I found a clue in the slums. I should check in the small hive prison south of Abrassar, if I haven’t done so already.
Find a clue inside a wooden outpost in the burnt forest, in Enmerkar’s south.
Find a clue in the Levant’s slums, in Abrassar.
Talk to Cyrene, in the city of Levant, in the Abrassar desert.
Find Prince Pietro in the Undercity Passage, under Levant’s slums.
Find a clue inside the small hive prison in the south of Abrassar, north of the largest hive.
The prince’s murderer has already been captured.
Talk to Queen Calixa for a reward, in the Palace of Levant.
Any evidence that would solve the murder is long gone…
Find a clue, with your only lead being insect chitin found in Abrassar’s southern hives.
Enjoy the peace you helped create.
value
Rissa, in the city of Berg, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Rissa, in the city of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest.
Go to the Blue Chamber in Berg, then talk to Rissa.
Go to Berg’s inn.
Go back to the Blue Chamber and eliminate the threat.
Find Balthazar and clues in the Ancestor’s Resting Place, via the Necropolis under the Blue Chamber.
Rescue Rissa from an outpost in the burnt forest in the south of Enmerkar.
Talk to Rissa, in Berg.
[Optional] Kill the mercenary leader in the Enmerkar Forest, in the south of the region.
Rissa, in the city of Berg, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Rissa, in the city of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest.
Talk to the Ash Giant highlord in their village, in the north-east of the Hallowed Marsh.
[Optional] Prepare for the negotiations by talking to other giants or scholars.
Find a rare root that grows in the Reptilian Lair, in the center of the Marsh.
Talk to Gold Belly, the Ash Giant.
[You have been banished from the Ash Giant’s village, permanently.]
Talk to Rissa, in the city of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest.
Talk to Highlord Cyr, in the Giant’s village, in the north-east of the Marsh.
Negotiate an alliance with the Giant’s village, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Rissa, in the city of Berg, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Rissa, in the city of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest.
Find Roland inside the Blue Chamber’s path in the Conflux Mountain. This mountain is the tall purple peak in the center of the Chersonese.
Meet up with Roland in the Ley Line chamber, in the mountain’s core.
Find Roland inside the Starfish Cave south of Cierzo. The tides only allow access to the cave at night.
Talk to Gabriella, in the city of Berg, inside the Enmerkar Forest.
[Optional] Talk to Roland, in Berg, about focusing his magical power.
[Optional] Find a smith in Berg to make a trinket for Roland.
[Optional] Taleron, in Berg, needs Blue Sand, a Mana Stone, and either an Emerald or a Ruby to make Roland’s focus tool.
Kill the green shell horror in the Cabal of Winds’ temple, in Enmerkar Forest’s south-west.
Wait 2 days for Gabriella to confirm you slew the horror. Talk to her when she has returned.
Find Julius inside Berg’s Inn.
Burn a Greasy Fern at each of the 2 altars inside the Necropolis.
Talk to Rissa in the Necropolis or in Berg.
Find Roland and Gabriella in the Necropolis under the Blue Chamber.
Return to Gabriella in Berg, and report that you’ve killed the green shell horror.
Talk to Sagard Battleborn, in Berg’s inn.
Find Gabriella in the Necropolis under the Blue Chamber.
Find Roland in the Necropolis, now that the barrier has vanished.
Rissa, in the city of Berg, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Rissa, in the city of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest.
Convince Sagard Battleborn, in Berg’s inn, to make peace.
Go to the temple in Monsoon, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Protect Monsoon from the invading Scourge Beasts.
Talk to Rissa in Monsoon.
Enjoy the peace you helped create.
Convince the Montcalm tribe, found inside the wooden fort in the Chersonese’s north, to make peace.
Convince the Ash Giants in their village, in the Hallowed Marsh’s north-east, to make peace.
value
Cyrene, in the city of Levant, will have a task for you in 3 days
Talk to Cyrene, in the city of Levant, inside the Abrassar desert.
Talk to Cyrene in the Blue Chamber. The chamber is in the city of Berg, inside the Enmerkar Forest.
Talk to Kapros, inside the Blue Chamber, near its entrance.
Leave the Blue Chamber.
Report to those in the Blue Chamber about the bomb you stopped.
Search the Necropolis under the Blue Chamber for clues or ask around for information.
Search the tomb and caves under the Blue Chamber for clues about your attackers. Someone in the city might know something too.
Rescue Kirouac from the outpost in the burnt forest in the south of Enmerkar.
Kill the mercenaries inside the outpost in the burnt forest, in the south of Enmerkar.
Kill the bandits inside the Necropolis, under the Blue Chamber.
Talk to Cyrene in the city of Levant, inside Abrassar.
Rescue Kirouac, who’s inside the fort tower of the burnt forest at the very south of Enmerkar.
Cyrene, in the city of Levant, will have a task for you in 3 days
Talk to Cyrene, in the city of Levant, in the Abrassar desert.
Go to Levant’s slums and find information on the Sand Corsairs.
Interrogate the scouts inside a fort in Abrassar. Go south of Levant, then west into a valley.
Talk to Yzan in Levant.
Get to Old Levant, in the north-west of Abrassar. Pass though a cave known as The Slide, north-west of the shipwrecks.
Report to Yzan.
Report to Yzan.
Report to Yzan.
Leave the tower and report to Yzan.
Report to Cyrene.
Stop the Corsair’s leader inside the Vigil tower, in the western part of Old Levant.
Queen Calixia, in the Levant Palace, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Calixa, in Levant’s Palace.
Go to the city of Monsoon, using a small boat in the northern docks of the Hallowed Marsh.
Talk with Monsoon’s alchemist, Laine Aberforth.
Bring Monsoon’s alchemist 5 raw Marshmelons and 1 Phytosaur Horn.
Talk to the Soroborean Caravanner in Monsoon.
Return to the alchemist in half a day.
Talk to the Soroborean Caravanner in Monsoon.
Bring an ancient tablet to the Soroborean Caravanner. The artifact is inside the Spire, in the Marsh’s south-east.
Pay 300 silver to the Soroborean Caravanner.
Report to Queen Calixa, in the Palace in Levant, in Abrassar Desert.
Report to Queen Calixa, in the Palace in Levant, in Abrassar Desert.
Queen Calixia, in the Levant Palace, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Queen Calixa, in Levant’s Palace, in the Abrassar desert.
Find Cyrene and Yzan in the north of Abrassar, where “the boats used to be tied, high and dry.”
Confront Yzan in the old docks.
[Optional] Ask around Levant for clues on the riddle.
Investigate the old docks on the clifftops, in the northern part of Abrassar.
Go to Levant’s Palace.
Find a way into Levant’s Palace, though the traitors have a head start.
Enter the city of Levant using the slums’ southern gate.
Enter Levant’s slums.
Kill the traitor commander in the Sand Rose Cave, to the far south-east of Abrassar.
Return to Markus, at Levant’s slums’ gate.
Find someone in the slums who can help.
Bring Pigeoneye, in Levant’s slums, 1 Tripwire Trap Kit and 1 set of Iron Spikes.
Enter the Undercity Passage through a red door in the western part of the slums.
Disperse the soldiers guarding the Undercity Passage entrance.
Give a filled Waterskin to the soldiers guarding the Undercity Passage in the slums.
Find a secret path into the Palace, in the Undercity Passage.
Pay Dawne 50 silver for a way into the Palace.
Reach Levant’s Palace through the secret path.
Use the key to open the Palace’s secret path.
Stop Cyrene from escaping.
Go to the Monsoon’s Temple, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Protect Monsoon from the invading Scourge Beasts.
Talk to King Simeon.
Enjoy the peace you helped create.
Talk to King Simeon.
value
Ellinara, in the city of Monsoon, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Ellinara, in the city of Monsoon, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Sacrifice some of your stamina on the altar.
Find Oliele inside the Corrupted Tomb.
Move away from the altar.
Destroy the ghosts.
Talk to Oliele.
Burn Greasy Fern at the altar on the hill just west of the Marsh’s Vigil. Such plants can be found not far from the altar, or bought.
Talk to Ellinara, in Monsoon.
Find the Corrupted Tomb, in the valley beyond the Ghost Pass dungeon, in the Chersonese’s north-east.
Talk to Ellinara, in Monsoon.
This dungeon contains the source of the barrier blocking access to the corrupted altar. Find that source and disable it.
Open the barrier by helping Myriade find his bones or by smashing his skull.
Go in the altar in the Corrupted Tomb, now that the barrier is down.
Find Myriade’s parts; his left arm, his right and and his left leg. Bring the parts to his body.
Talk to Oliele in the Corrupted Tomb.
Ellinara, in the city of Monsoon, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Ellinara, in the city of Monsoon, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Meet Oliele at the Blue Chamber, in the city of Berg, inside the Enmerkar Forest.
[Optional] Find Zephyrien, who went missing in the far south-east of Enmerkar.
Talk to Ellinara, in the city of Monsoon, inside the Hallowed Marsh.
Talk to Lockwell, in Monsoon, about freeing Oliele.
Give enough coin to Lockwell, to free Oliele.
Rescue Oliele from a cellar, in a cluster of ruins on the Pilgrim Road.
Tell Ellinara, in Monsoon, about Oliele’s freedom.
Ask around Monsoon for clues about Oliele’s location.
Talk to Oliele.
[Optional] Find clues in Monsoon on Zephyrien’s whereabouts.
Ellinara, in the city of Monsoon, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk with Ellinara, in the city of Monsoon, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Meet with Oliele in the slums of Levant, in the southern part of the city. That city is in the Abrassar desert, accessible by passing through the Enmerkar Forest first.
Talk to Oliele in the Garden, with its towering dead tree, in the center of Abrassar.
Talk to Oliele in Old Levant, to the north-west of Abrassar, near the Vigil.
Talk to Oliele inside the Stone Titan Caves, under the immense statues in the center of Abrassar.
Get the tablet translated by Soroborean Caravans found in any city or by Mofat in Monsoon.
Talk to Oliele, in the city of Monsoon, inside the Hallowed Marsh.
Go in Monsoon’s temple and talk to Oliele.
Find the rebel priests hiding in a giant lotus, in the northern part of the Hallowed Marsh.
The rebels were already dead. Talk to Oliele before leaving the lotus.
You killed the rebels. Talk to Oliele before leaving the lotus.
The rebels have left the Holy Mission. Talk to Oliele before leaving the lotus.
Talk to Oliele in the lotus.
Tell Ellinara, in Monsoon, that Oliele has left the Holy Mission.
Report to Ellinara, in Monsoon.
Talk to Cardinal Bourlamaque, in the temple in Monsoon.
Cardinal Bourlamaque, in the city of Monsoon, will have a task for you in 3 days.
Talk to Cardinal Bourlamaque, in Monsoon’s Temple, in the Hallowed Marsh.
Ask around Monsoon about Levant’s agents arrested by Lockwell.
Rescue the agents from a cellar in a cluster of ruins, along the Pilgrim Road between Monsoon and the way to the Chersonese.
Talk with Levant’s agents in the cellar.
Talk to Cardinal Bourlamaque, in Monsoon’s temple.
Report to Cardinal Bourlamaque that Levant’s agents were slain, then prepare to end the war.
Go to the city of Berg, inside the Enmerkar Forest.
Give a Tribal Favor or a sum of silver to Rissa, in Berg.
Go to the city of Levant, in the Abrassar Desert.
Search around the city for someone with a way to enter Levant.
Enter Levant using the Undercity Passage, just south of the city.
Find a way into the Palace.
Go in the Undercity Passage and through the Palace secret path. The Passage's entrance is a red door in the slums.
Talk to Yzan in Levant’s palace.
Kill Cyrene and Yzan.
Kill Cyrene.
Talk with King Simeon.
Go to Monsoon’s Temple, inside the Hallowed Marsh.
Go to the altar in Monsoon’s Temple.
Protect Monsoon from the invading Scourge Beasts.
Destroy the Corruption in Calixa’s soul.
Talk to Cardinal Bourlamaque, in Monsoon.
Enjoy the peace you helped to create.
Your body grows weak as time passes. Eventually, you will truly die after being defeated.
Move on.
Give Horror Chitin, a Tribal Favor or a Coralhorn Bow to Gabriella, in Berg. The temple in Enmerkar’s south-west contains horrors.
Convince Sagard, in Berg’s inn, to oppose the war.

Craft: Tsar & Tenebrous Armor
Craft: Palladium Armor
Craft: Copal & Petrified Armor

Ledger to Cierzo
Ledger to Levant
